General.Name: Alpha Microelectronics
General.Description: Alpha Microelectronics Corporation engages in the research, design, development, application, and marketing of integrated circuits (ICs). The company offers speech ICs, multi-channel voice ICs, general-purpose MCUs, LCD MCUs, 32-bit MCUs, and recording ICs, as well as hardware and software tools; and accessory ICs, such as motor drivers, audio amplifiers, ADC and microphone input, and wireless power transfer products. Its products are primarily used in consumer products, such as sound equipment, personal electronics, home appliances, toys, gifts, and interactive consumer items. Alpha Microelectronics Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: 295, Kuang Fu Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan
